name: Topdown shooter
description:
Gameplay:

You are a white square and the red squares (a.k.a enemies) are chasing you. your goal is to stay alive as long as you can; but you are not defenseless. If you click, you shoot a projectile. The projectile will face the mouse pointer and go in that direction. However if the projectile touches an enemy it will kill it and reward you with a coin. If an enemy reaches to you then the game is over, but you keep the coins you collected. You can spend those coins in the shop. Simply click the ability you want to upgrade to do so.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Aim with your mouse and shoot with Leftclick

Shop:

  • Speed: Increases your movement speed
  • Reload:  Shortens the time between shots
  • Multishot: Increases the number of bullets you shoot at once

Got bored?

  •  By clicking the arrows next to the difficulty text you can increase or decrease it.
